channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Prediction market Kalshi enters sports betting ahead of Super Bowl, days after naming Donald Trump Jr. as an advisor
item.description: “Today, on the heels of our explosive growth, Kalshi takes its next big step: Sports.”

item.title: The U.S. economy has been revving up for two years — is there room to improve?
Bill Gates reveals he probably would be diagnosed on the autism spectrum if he were growing up today
item.description: "During my childhood, the fact that some people's brains process information differently from others wasn't widely understood."

item.title: Javier Milei’s free-market shock therapy to transform Argentina’s economy gets huge endorsement as sudden growth rebound seen
item.description: Moody's upgraded Argentina one notch to Caa3 from Ca and boosted its outlook to positive from stable.

item.title: As Target ends DEI practices, Costco and its shareholders are staying the course
Elon Musk wants to kill the penny. The little coin has won this battle before.
The federal jobs put on the line by Trump’s executive orders
Roger Goodell sent the NFL more than 50 letters pleading for an internship in the early 1980s until he finally got his chance
item.description: “I thought the NFL played a really important role in society and had a great future,” Goodell said.

item.title: A Canadian freighter has been stuck in Lake Erie’s ice for days, and more ships are arriving to help free it
item.description: The Manitoulin, a 663-foot Canadian vessel with 17 people on board, got stuck in the ice on Lake Erie on Wednesday.

item.title: Will Trump’s return-to-office order have private-sector spillover? Not likely.
